newsitem.title: UK: Nigeria frees British man from detention.
newsitem.headline: Nigeria frees British man from detention.

text.p: A British man detained in Nigeria for two months without charge was set free on Friday, British officials said.
"Bruce Henderson has been released into our care in Lagos," said a spokesman for the Foreign Office. "We're delighted with the news."
Henderson, 42, who had been working on a rain forest project in neighbouring Cameroon, was detained on December 22 while travelling through the Bakassi peninsula in southeast Nigeria.
A territorial dispute in the oil-rich area has resulted in numerous clashes between Nigerian and Cameroon soldiers.
